content: TE-CX (SDS Plus) Imperial hammer drill bit set Ultimate SDS Plus (TE-C) hammer drill bits sets with different bit diameters and lengths (imperial) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features New solid carbide head has high wear-resistance and makes more precise holes for anchor setting – up to 30% more lifetime than other SDS Plus drill bits Installation of all HKD anchors with embedment depth above 30 mm Quadruple helix and optimum head geometry for consistently fast drilling speed over the entire life of the drill bit Indicator mark – the bit is suitable for setting anchors as long as this mark is visible In the unlikely event of breakage, the drill bit will be considered for replacement as long as the wear mark on the helix is still visible Applications Drilling holes for metal anchors in reinforced and unreinforced concrete Drilling holes for post-installed rebar connections Drilling drainage holes for drying out buildings Drilling through-holes for pipes and cables ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Base material: Reinforced concrete, Concrete, Brick, Masonry Working mode: Hammer drilling Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Base material | Reinforced concrete, Concrete, Brick, Masonry | Working mode | Hammer drilling | Head shape | Multi Cutter | Head material composition | Tungsten carbide | Number of cutting edges | 4 ### ITEMS- 2341108 - Hammer drill bit TE-CX Set (6) M5 SD - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE-CX 3/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4- 4 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 3/8-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 1/2-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 5/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 2341109 - Hammer drill bit TE-CX Set (6) M6 U - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x TE-CX 1/4-6 Hammer drill bit - 2x TE-CX 3/8-6 Hammer drill bit - 2x TE-CX(5) 1/2-6 Hammer drill bit - 2341107 - Hammer drill bit TE-CX Set (6) M4 GC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE-CX 3/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 5/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 3/8-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 1/2-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 5/8-8 Hammer drill bit
